devdoc.details: The Relay wrapper to facilitate ZBYT deposit/mint

returns._0: true if forwarder_ is trusted forwarder

params.chain_: Chain id for which the relay address is set

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

performCrossChainCall(uint256,uint256,ui.details: This function can be called only the the registered escrow contract

params.ack_: Unique hash of the cross chain deposit/mint call
params.callbackContract_: Address of contract on source chain to handle callback
params.destCallData_: Calldata for the call on destination chain
params.destContract_: Address of contract to be called on destination chain
params.relayParams_: Additional data that can be sent to the relay
params.relayid_: Relay id that should be used for this call

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setRelayAddress(uint256,uint256,address).details: set the relay address to 0 to disable the relay

params.chain_: Chain id for which the relay address is set
params.relayid_: Relay id for which relay address is set

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.ack_: Unique hash of the cross chain deposit/mint call
params.callbackContract_: Address of contract on source chain to handle callback
params.destContract_: Address of contract to be called on destination chain

relayContract.details: relay id is an identifier for relay (e.g., 0 -> zbyte relay, 1 -> axelar, etc)

devdoc.title: The Relay wrapper to facilitate ZBYT deposit/mint

CallerNotEscrow(address,address).notice: error (0x5c87504d): Caller is not the registered escrow

InvalidCallBackContract().notice: error (0xeed987a0): The callback contract address is 0 but ack is set

RelayContractNotSet(uint256,address,addr.notice: error (0x089c2a3e): The relay contract address is not set for the given relay id

EscrowAddressSet(address).notice: error (0x14229a64): Address of escrow contract is set

RelayAddressSet(uint256,uint256,address).notice: error (0xbe32fe92): Address of Relay is set for given chain id and relay id

isTrustedForwarder(address).notice: Check if the given address is the trusted forwarder

isValidRelay(uint256,address).notice: Verify if given relay is a valid one for the given chain id

performCrossChainCall(uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Initiate the cross chain call for deposit/mint

relayContract(uint256,uint256).notice: mapping of chain id => relay id => relay address

setEscrowAddress(address).notice: Set the address of Escrow contract

setRelayAddress(uint256,uint256,address).notice: Set the address of Relay contract

updatePayload(uint256,address,bytes32,ad.notice: Update the payload to include additional information
